 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שַׁלְהֶ֫בֶת‎</span> **noun feminine** ==flame== (Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎שַׁלְהוֺבִיתָא‎</span> <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">) — in <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לַהֶבֶת שׁ‎</span> [[Ezek.21.3|Ezek 21:3]], of judgment; so <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שַׁלְהָ֑בֶת‎</span> [[Job.15.30|Job 15:30]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רִשְׁפֵּי אֵשׁ שַׁלְהֶבֶתְיָה‎</span> [[Song.8.6|Song 8:6]] i.e. ***Yahweh-flame*** = powerful flame (&gt; Jäger<sup>BAS i.471</sup> [[BDB#Jastr|Jastr]]<sup>JBL xiii (1894), 111</sup> explains <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יָֿה‎</span> here as encl. particle)
